accept_terms: I accept Souko's Terms and Conditions
name: Name
homePageHero3: We provide you with a dashboard to manage your inventory, sales, customers along with a personalized e-commerce for your products only.
homeFeatures3: Make decisions that grow your business.
homeFeatures4: Souko provides you with insightful metrics on your sales, revenues, profits, expenses over a period of time.
homeFeatures6: Have full control over your business in one place.
homeFeatures7: Record order, add new products, save your customers' contacts all at one place.
homeFeatures9: Get more sales, sell anywhere to anyone
homeFeatures10: We offer you a dedicated e-commerce page that people can visit and purchase your products conveniently.
homeWhySouko3: Souko is user friendly and can be used on any device anywhere
homeWhySouko5: Anytime, anywhere have a look at how your business performs in real time.
homeWhySouko7: Just create an account and start enjoying Souko. No charges or payments required.
homeWhySouko9: Allow your customers to order your products directly on SOUKO
homeCallToAction1: Start managing your store efficiently with Souko today
faqsStore3: Click on the button labelled 'Create store' located in your top navigation bar
faqsStore4: Fill the 'Create account' form by filling the required fields. Click on the button 'Create account'.
faqsStore5: Fill the 'Create your store' form by filling the required fields. Click on the button 'Create store'.
faqsStore6: A link will be sent to your email.
faqsStore7: Kindly click on the link sent to your email to activate your account. You will be redirected to the login page where you can login with your credentials.
faqsStore8: Where can you get the insights
faqsStore10: The insights should be on your dashboard
faqsProducts4: Click on the button labelled 'Add Product' located in your top navigation bar.
faqsProducts5: Fill the 'Add product' form by filling the required fields. Click on the button 'Add product'.
faqsProducts6: The product should appear in your products ( Accessible by clicking on the link 'Products' in your side navigation bar ).
faqsProducts9: Click on the link 'Products' located in your side navigation bar to view your products.
faqsProducts10: Click on the vertical three points to view the actions. And click on the option 'Delete' to delete the product.
faqsCustomers4: Click on the link 'Customers' located in your side navigation bar to view your customers.
faqsCustomers5: Click on the button labelled 'Add Customer' located next to the title 'Customers'.
faqsCustomers6: Fill the 'Create customer' form by filling the required fields. Click on the button 'Create customer'.
faqsCustomers7: The customer should appear in your customers list.
faqsOrders4: Click on the button 'Record order' located in your top navigation bar.
faqsOrders5: Kindly ensure that the customer placing the order is registered in the platform. If not you could click on the link 'Quickly add a new customer' to register the customer and continue the process.
faqsOrders6: Fill the remaining required fields of the form. Click on the button 'Record order'.
faqsOrders7: The order should appear in your orders ( Accessible by clicking on the link 'Orders' in your side navigation bar ).
faqsEshop2: How to get your personalized e-commerce link ?
faqsEshop4: Click on the vertical three dots (...) button located in your top navigation bar.
faqsEshop5: Click on the option 'Copy E-Commerce Link' to copy the link on your clipboard.
faqsEshop6: Now you can paste the link anywhere you would like ( by right-clicking on your mouse and selecting the option 'Paste' )
faqsEshop7: Anyone with this link should be able to access your e-commerce page.
faqsEshop8: How does the personalized e-commerce work ?
faqsEshop9:
The personalized E-commerce page allows you to easily sell your products to your customers.
Let's say you have a customer that is interested by your products and would like to purchase them.
faqsEshop10: Copy the E-commerce link to your clipboard. ( Check the question above for more details ).
faqsEshop11: Forward the link to the customer.
faqsEshop12: Once he clicks on the link, he will access your e-commerce page. He will be able to select the products he wants and place his order.
faqsEshop13:
He will be asked for some personal information before placing the order. If it is his/her first time placing an order, the platform will require a confirmation of the email address before validating the order.
( A link will be sent to his email. He will have to click on it for his order to be confirmed ).
faqsEshop14:
When the order is confirmed, the admin of the store should receive an email with the order id.
He/She can login, check the order and contact the customer for delivery
faqsEshop15: Unfortunately, we don't yet accept payments on the platform. We are currently working on it.
